result.eng: She was unhappy with the results.
result.ga: Bhí sí míshásta leis na torthaí
result.orig: Bhí sí míshásta leis na torthaí
result.html: Bhí sí míshásta leis na torthaíShe was unhappy with the results.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí sí míẛásta leis na torṫaíShe was unhappy with the results.

result.eng: The results of the competition will be announced tomorrow.
result.html: Fógrófar torthaí an chomórtais amárachThe results of the competition will be announced tomorrow.
result.ponchtml: Fógrófar torṫaí an ċomórtais amáraċThe results of the competition will be announced tomorrow.

result.eng: She doesn't eat fruits or vegetables.
result.ga: Ní itheann sí glasraí ná torthaí
result.orig: Ní itheann sí glasraí ná torthaí
result.html: Ní itheann sí glasraí ná torthaíShe doesn't eat fruits or vegetables.
result.ponchtml: Ní iṫeann sí glasraí ná torṫaíShe doesn't eat fruits or vegetables.

result.eng: To present the research results to the public.
result.ga: Torthaí na taighde a chur i láthair an phobail
result.orig: Torthaí na taighde a chur i láthair an phobail
result.html: Torthaí na taighde a chur i láthair an phobailTo present the research results to the public.
result.ponchtml: Torṫaí na taiġde a ċur i láṫair an ṗobailTo present the research results to the public.

result.eng: We are looking forward to the results very much.
result.ga: Tá muid ag súil go mór leis na torthaí
result.orig: Tá muid ag súil go mór leis na torthaí
result.html: Tá muid ag súil go mór leis na torthaíWe are looking forward to the results very much.
result.ponchtml: Tá muid ag súil go mór leis na torṫaíWe are looking forward to the results very much.

result.eng: I am very happy with the results.
result.ga: Tá mé an-sásta leis na torthaí
result.orig: Tá mé an-sásta leis na torthaí
result.html: Tá mé an-sásta leis na torthaíI am very happy with the results.
result.ponchtml: Tá mé an-sásta leis na torṫaíI am very happy with the results.

result.eng: She still felt nauseous from the incident.
result.ga: Bhí masmas uirthi fós de thoradh na heachtra
result.orig: Bhí masmas uirthi fós de thoradh na heachtra
result.html: Bhí masmas uirthi fós de thoradh na heachtraShe still felt nauseous from the incident.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí masmas uirṫi fós de ṫoraḋ na heaċtraShe still felt nauseous from the incident.

result.eng: Also, what bloggers often got in response to their opinions was abuse from anonymous people.
result.ga: Ba mhinic fosta gur maslaí ó dhaoine le hainmneacha cleite a bhíodh mar thoradh ar na tuairimí a nocht blagadóirí
result.orig: Ba mhinic fosta gur maslaí ó dhaoine le hainmneacha cleite a bhíodh mar thoradh ar na tuairimí a nocht blagadóirí
result.html: Ba mhinic fosta gur maslaí ó dhaoine le hainmneacha cleite a bhíodh mar thoradh ar na tuairimí a nocht blagadóiríAlso, what bloggers often got in response to their opinions was abuse from anonymous people.
result.ponchtml: Ba ṁinic fosta gur maslaí ó ḋaoine le hainmneaċa cleite a ḃíoḋ mar ṫoraḋ ar na tuairimí a noċt blagadóiríAlso, what bloggers often got in response to their opinions was abuse from anonymous people.

result.eng: And you should know that they look with favour on what priests say in Dublin.
result.ga: Agus bíodh a fhios agat go mbíonn toradh i mBaile Átha Cliath fá choinne na sagart
result.orig: Agus bíodh a fhios agat go mbíonn toradh i mBaile Átha Cliath fá choinne na sagart
result.html: Agus bíodh a fhios agat go mbíonn toradh i mBaile Átha Cliath fá choinne na sagartAnd you should know that they look with favour on what priests say in Dublin.
result.ponchtml: Agus bíoḋ a ḟios agat go mbíonn toraḋ i mBaile Áṫa Cliaṫ fá ċoinne na sagartAnd you should know that they look with favour on what priests say in Dublin.
